about_the_game:
After their village was razed by the Demon Lord’s army, Monica set out on a journey with her childhood friends Kyle and Sophia. Their goal was to defeat the Demon Lord, but since they weren’t strong enough, they just ended up fighting his minions instead and doing odd jobs.

Their grand adventure comes to a sudden and disappointing end when they’re told a grand hero has already defeated the Demon King. Without a clear goal in life, Kyle takes the opportunity to propose to Monica, and they decide to settle down in the city of Clematis along with their party. There’s just one catch—there’s a one million gold fee to become a citizen of Clematis, and they have 60 days to come up with the hefty sum. Renting a room at an inn in the city, Kyle and his new wife will have to find a way to raise enough money.


With the Demon Lord defeated and enemies dwindling, adventuring isn’t as lucrative as it used to be. Monica and her friends, Kyle, Sophia, and Milli, all need to find their own ways to earn gold as fast as possible. With her allies easily making their way into new jobs, Monica must look around town for odd jobs or fight her way through guild quests.

Work in the town bakery, become a research subject, or hire new allies to help fight sewer monsters. Just make sure not to let your stamina get too low! Stop by the shop and grab some items to boost your energy or upgrade your equipment!







Jobs
Work various jobs for people around the city to earn money! Collect or purchase different outfits to increase the number of jobs available to you. Different jobs are available on different days of the week, but you only have 60 days to earn enough money to settle in the city. It's a race against time! Carefully manage your stamina to earn enough money before the 60 days are up.

Quests
There’s one other way to earn citizenship in Clematis… and that's to become a B rank adventurer in the guild! Take on quests to earn money and increase your guild rank! Hire other adventurers to aid you in fighting bosses! Enjoy a series of dungeons and simple RPG combat as you rise through the ranks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Monica has married her childhood sweetheart and is now settling in the city with her new family. But it's going to take one million gold to buy her citizenship! Work odd jobs and fight monsters to make enough gold before time runs out!
